dcterms:description: Simulated dust emission maps constructed from a turbulent hydrodynamic simulation of the diffuse interstellar medium, with dust emission proportional to gas density.
dcterms:title: Simulated dust emission maps

dcterms:creator: Planck Collaboration I
dcterms:description: Simulated CMB maps generated by sampling Gaussian draws characterized by a covariance matrix parametrized by cosmological parameters.
dcterms:title: Simulated CMB maps
